title: In case of the plot reserved for the Parking Lot 125% built up area as per zonal basic permissible FSI of such reserved area shall be handed over to the Municipal Corporation
clause_text: In case of the plot reserved for the Parking Lot 125% built up area as per zonal basic permissible FSI of such reserved area shall be handed over to the Municipal Corporation. The developer / owner shall be entitled for the Built up Area (BUA) in lieu of cost of construction against handing over of built up amenity.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
